00022 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"

00025 
00026 // this is a toy program to exercise covariate normalization
00027 
00028 void executecube()
00029 {
00030         // try out the cubic regression
00031         vector<double> C,S,W;
00032         vector<double> Eqn,Pred;
00033         float ti;
00034         float i;
00035         for (i=0; i<10; i++)
00036         {
00037                 ti=i;
00038                 S.push_back(ti);
00039                 ti=i*i*i + 3*i*i+7*i+1;
00040                 C.push_back(ti);
00041                 W.push_back(1);
00042         }
00043         FitWeightedCubic(C,S,W,Eqn,Pred);
00044         td(C);
00045         td(S);
00046         td(W);
00047         td(Eqn);
00048         td(Pred);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void executenorm()
00052 {
00053         NormalizationFrame Test;
00054         vector<double> C,S;
00055         float ti;
00056         float i;
00057         for (i=0; i<11; i++)
00058         {
00059                 ti = (i-90)/90;
00060                 C.push_back(ti);
00061                 S.push_back(i);
00062                 ti = (i+78)/90;
00063                 C.push_back(ti);
00064                 S.push_back(i);
00065                 ti = (i-5.5)/90;
00066                 C.push_back(ti);
00067                 S.push_back(i);
00068         }
00069         td(C);
00070         td(S);
00071 
00072         Test.FillInContrast(C);
00073         Test.FillInCovariates(S);
00074         Test.FitEM();
00075         Test.ThisFit.TargetCenter.resize(3);
00076         cout << "AA:\t";
00077         td(Test.ThisFit.fitAA);
00078         cout << "AB:\t";
00079         td(Test.ThisFit.fitAB);
00080         cout << "BB:\t";
00081         td(Test.ThisFit.fitBB);
00082         cout << "sigma:\t";
00083         td(Test.ThisFit.sigma);
00084 
00085         Test.ThisFit.TargetCenter[0]=-.66;
00086         Test.ThisFit.TargetCenter[1] = 0;
00087         Test.ThisFit.TargetCenter[2] = .66;
00088         
00089         vector<double> dummy, dummypred;
00090         dummy.push_back(0); // dummy covariate
00091         dummy.push_back(0);
00092         dummy.push_back(0);
00093         dummy.push_back(0);
00094         for (int blah=0; blah<C.size(); blah++)
00095         {
00096                 dummypred.push_back( Test.ThisFit.MakePrediction(C[blah],dummy));
00097         }
00098         /*
00099     cout<< "C" << "\t";
00100     td(C);
00101     cout<< "CX" << "\t";
00102     td(dummypred);
00103   */
00104 }
00105 
00106 int main( int argc, char *argv[])
00107 {
00108         executenorm();
00109         // executecube();
00110 }
